# Deep work by Cal Newport

Deep work is the ability to focus without distraction on a cognitively demanding task. It's a skill that allows you to quickly master complicated information and produce better results in less time.

## Why deep work is important

- **High-Quality Work**: Deep work allows you to quickly master complicated information and produce better results in less time.
- **High-Quality Leisure**: The ability to concentrate intensely is a skill that can be applied to all aspects of your life.
- **Sense of Fulfillment**: Deep work is one of the most satisfying and rewarding activities a person can engage in.

## How to achieve deep work

- **Work deeply**: To work deeply, you must eliminate all distractions and focus all your energy on the task at hand.
- **Embrace boredom**: The ability to concentrate is a skill that must be trained. Start by eliminating all distractions and sitting quietly with your thoughts.
- **Quit social media**: Social media is designed to be addictive. By quitting social media, you'll free up time for more meaningful activities.

## Conclusion

Deep work is becoming increasingly rare at a time when it is becoming increasingly valuable. By mastering the art of deep work, you'll be able to outcompete your peers and produce better results in less time.
